Alexeev

Hello, friends!

My name is Alexeev. Last 3 years I make web sites and IT-services for small and middle businesses.

Mostly I use clean JS with HTML5 and CSS3. But for successful development I don't forget about modern fraimworks. I like React.js best of all. Also I use Gulp, Git, jQuery and Less.

My portfolio consits from two projects. There are the best works during two years.

Check out my portfolio and visit my socials. Best regards!
